food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys like to eat me too! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a fruit.
💛 My peel is the color of sunshine.
🥄 You can mash me up for babies.

food.question: I am crunchy and grow underground. Bunnies love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🧡 I am often orange.
🌱 You plant a tiny seed to grow me.

food.question: I am round and red, juicy and sweet. Doctors say I keep them away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a fruit.
✨ I am often shiny and bright.
🥧 You can make a pie with me.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐮 I make your bones strong.
🥣 You can pour me on cereal.

food.question: I am a sweet treat that is cold and creamy. I come in many flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍨 I melt if you leave me out in the sun.
🍦 You can eat me in a cone or a cup.
🍫 You can add chocolate sauce on top!

food.question: I am long and thin, and you slurp me up with a fork. I'm often served with tomato sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I am a popular Italian dish.
🍅 I am made from flour and water.
♨️ You boil me in hot water.

food.question: I am a small, round vegetable that can be green, yellow, or red. You can eat me raw in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am often used in salads.
🧅 I am NOT an onion.
☀️ Some are sweet and some are a little sour.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast. I am baked in an oven and you can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I can be white or brown.
🥪 You can spread butter or jam on me.
🌾 I am often made from wheat.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin. Inside, I am green and have lots of tiny black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am grown in warm climates.
🥄 You can scoop me out with a spoon.
✈️ I am not native to Europe or America

food.question: I am a small, brown seed. People grind me up and use me to make a hot drink that helps them wake up. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ Some people drink me every morning.
🌍 I am grown in many countries around the world.
🌱 I grow on a tree in the tropics.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I like to fall when it is freezing.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🌬️ I am cold!

weather.question: I make the sun disappear, and sometimes bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ You can't see very far when I'm around.
☁️ I'm made of water droplets.
⚫ I'm often gray or white.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am very pretty.
🌞 You can often see me when the sun shines after rain
🔴 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am hot and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🔥 I give you warmth.
🌝 I disappear at night.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky. You need an umbrella when I'm here. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ I make puddles.
💧 I help flowers grow.
⛈️ I sometimes come with thunder.

weather.question: I can be gentle or strong. I make trees sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can blow leaves off trees.
💨 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I can be a breeze or a gust.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🌩️ I can be scary.
🔊 You can hear me.
⚡ I follow a flash of light.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I come before the boom.
✨ I am very bright.
⛈️ I am part of a thunderstorm.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. I can hurt if I hit you!

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice
🤕 Sometimes, I can cause a bump on your head
🏌️ Golf ball size me can damage cars

weather.question: I am a big storm with a spinning wind. I form over warm ocean waters.

hints.text: 🌀 I have an 'eye'.
🌊 I can cause lots of damage to coastal areas
🌬️ I have very strong winds!
